July 29, 1933 D Kegworth Contest
Kegworth Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
kegworth-contest
None
Happy Memories
Kegworth, Leicestershire, England, UK
Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £5, 3rd £2. Special prize for band never having won a cash prize - Derby Junction Street. Promoted in aid of Kegworth Hospital. 9 bands competed.
Sept. 17, 2013, 2:04 p.m. April 16, 2018, 3:28 p.m.
